biotools.summary: Server designed to build force field libraries for new molecules and molecular fragments. One can derive molecular electrostatic potential-based atomic charges embedded in force field libraries for use in force field development, charge validation and molecular dynamics simulations.

bioschemas.name: R.E.D.
